data.message: Angus the angry orange orangutang from Uranus he's a geek he's tweaking often jaw is creaking and popping while he's coughing up coffee beans inside of his coffin my shadow is stalking me see it's a cop and copy of me and it lives in the top of trees rap-a-saurus roaring I make the chorus boring Uglier than George foreman hornier than the whore on the store corner but could fork you with four borners
